H0.text: Discussing the findings with scientists who agree with you is the best way to communicate findings that result from scientific inquiry.

H1.text: Discussing the findings with a wellâ€‘known scientist is the best way to communicate findings that result from scientific inquiry, where scientists use the scientific method to raise and attempt to answer new questions.

H2.text: Publishing the findings in scientific journals is the best way to communicate results that arise from the scientific method, an inquiry process by which scientists raise and attempt to answer new questions.

H3.text: Publishing the findings in local newspapers is the best way to communicate findings that result from scientific inquiry, according to the question about the scientific method.

A4.text: Publishing research results is an essential part of helping science to advance.

A5.text: The inability for independent researchers to reproduce published results is widespread, with 70% of researchers reporting failure to reproduce another scientist's results

A6.text: The peer review process contributes to quality control and it is an essential step to ascertain the standing and originality of the research.

A7.text: The process of academic publishing involves disseminating research findings to a wider audience.
